name: Warlock
//: Base mutation, branching outwards into multiple classes.
description: Warlocks are those who have made a deal with an otherworldly entity for knowledge.

name: Pact of The Elder
description: You follow the Elder One, praising their name in sacrifice.

name: Pact of The Hexbound
description: The Hexbound are the indentured of Qliphoth, The Patron Mistress. They are known for their curses, charms, and weaponplay.

name: Pact of the Fiend
description: You have made a pact with the devils and demons of lower worlds. Fire, ice, ḭ̴̂͂t̷̛̹̬ ̸͖͙̈́͝m̸̗̊a̵̢̍ţ̸̇̂t̴̝̃̿e̶̟̳̍̈́r̵̫̀s̷͖̈͊ ̴͇̳̓̽n̸͓͌͋ö̴̡̠́t̷̳́.
